name: EWE Mod
body:
### Elemental Weapon Enhancements
Supports tModLoader and Terraria 1.3.x +
Allows for custom weapon elements added on top of base damage, and custom behaviour.

Latest release: [click](https://github.com/gorateron/ElementalWeaponEnhancements/releases/latest)

### Want to join?
Let us know here: [click](http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/elemental-weapon-enhancements.46677/)

### Authors and Contributors
@gorateron (author)

### Support or Contact
PM me on TCF or Discord.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
